item.title: Chaos - Creation
item.description: [[songs/g/girls_under_glass/equilibrium/new_world_order.md#in-a-new-world-order-vyl-wnanory|A New World Order to decide the chaos,]] [[songs/g/girls_under_glass/equilibrium/new_world_order.md#in-a-new-world-order-vyl-wnanory|To daze our minds and to keep us blind]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_current_will_carry_us/pedestal.md#im-looking-back-on-those-i-once-looked-up-to-and-i-cant-help-vyl-wnanory|We’re blinded and we followed without rhyme or reason]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_current_will_carry_us/pedestal.

item.title: yOUR Song
item.description: [[songs/t/the_offspring/ixnay_on_the_hombre/gone_away.md#and-it-feels-vyl-wnanory|I’m far away from home,]] [[songs/t/the_offspring/ixnay_on_the_hombre/gone_away.md#and-it-feels-vyl-wnanory|I travel the world from town to town]] [[songs/t/the_offspring/ixnay_on_the_hombre/gone_away.md#and-it-feels-vyl-wnanory|And even when I feel alone,]] [[songs/t/the_offspring/ixnay_on_the_hombre/gone_away.
